lead_paragraph: This was the second time a newspaper in Kampala published photographs, along with the names and home addresses, of gay Ugandans.
snippet: This was the second time a newspaper in Kampala published photographs, along with the names and home addresses, of gay Ugandans.

headline.main: Paper Runs Photos of Gay Ugandans
headline.seo: Uganda Newspaper Publishes Photos of Homosexuals
headline.print_headline: Paper Runs Photos Of Gay Ugandans
